Hero.tagline: We build apps, websites, games, and anything in between.
Hero.description: Full-spectrum developers turning ideas into reality — from web apps to VR experiences.

About.title: About Us
About.p1: We are versatile developers passionate about building things that live on screens — and sometimes beyond them. Whether it's a sleek website, a powerful backend, an immersive game, or a VR experience, we bring ideas to life with code.
About.p2: Our toolkit spans across frontend and backend development, Unity game development, virtual reality, and hardware projects. We believe every challenge has a technical solution, and we enjoy finding it.
About.p3: If it can be built with a laptop, we can build it.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.desc: Modern, responsive web interfaces with React, Next.js, and TypeScript.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.desc: Scalable server-side solutions, APIs, and database architecture.

gamedev.title: Game Development
gamedev.desc: Interactive experiences and games built with Unity and C#.

vr.title: VR Development
vr.desc: Immersive virtual reality applications and environments.

hardware.title: Hardware Projects
hardware.desc: Physical computing, IoT, and embedded systems.

more.title: And More...
more.desc: Mobile apps, automation, tools — anything that can be built with technology.

project1.title: Sweet Delights Bakery
project1.desc: A playful bakery website with online ordering, menu showcase, and a warm cake-themed design.

project2.title: IronForge Gym
project2.desc: A bold fitness website with class schedules, membership plans, and a powerful gym-themed experience.

project3.title: NovaTech Solutions
project3.desc: A sleek SaaS startup landing page with product features, pricing plans, and modern tech aesthetics.

Contact.title: Get In Touch
Contact.description: Interested in working together? Feel free to reach out.
Contact.successDesc: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.

t1.quote: One of the most versatile teams I've worked with. Delivered a complex web platform ahead of schedule with exceptional quality.
t1.name: Alex Johnson

t2.quote: Built our VR training simulator from scratch. The attention to detail and immersive experience exceeded all expectations.
t2.name: Sarah Chen

t3.quote: Impressive full-stack skills. From the backend architecture to the polished frontend, everything was production-ready from day one.
t3.name: Michael Torres

e1.title: Started Coding
e1.desc: Wrote our first lines of code and fell in love with building things. Started with web development and quickly expanded to other areas.

e2.title: Dove Into Game Dev & VR
e2.desc: Discovered Unity and virtual reality development. Built our first game and VR experience, opening a whole new dimension of creation.

e3.title: Hardware & IoT Projects
e3.desc: Extended beyond screens into physical computing. Started working with Arduino, sensors, and building IoT systems.

e4.title: Full-Spectrum Developers
e4.desc: Combining all skills to deliver complete solutions. From web apps to VR experiences, from mobile apps to hardware — building without limits.

hero.tagline: Life Is Sweet, One Bite at a Time
hero.description: Handcrafted cakes, pastries, and desserts made with love. From birthday celebrations to cozy afternoon treats — we bake happiness.

f1.title: Baked Fresh Daily
f1.desc: Every cake and pastry is made fresh each morning with premium ingredients.

f2.title: Custom Designs
f2.desc: Dream it, we bake it. Custom cakes for any occasion, any size.

f3.title: Same-Day Delivery
f3.desc: Order before noon and get your treats delivered the same day.

f4.title: Allergy Friendly
f4.desc: Gluten-free, vegan, and nut-free options available for everyone.

cta.title: Craving Something Sweet?
cta.description: Order your favorite treats online and we'll deliver the sweetness to your door.

story.label: Our Story
story.title: Baked With Love Since 2018
story.p1: What started as a passion project in a tiny home kitchen has grown into Tashkent's most loved bakery. Our founder, Malika, turned her grandmother's recipes into works of art.
story.p2: Every morning at 4 AM, our bakers begin the ritual of crafting each pastry by hand. We source organic flour, farm-fresh eggs, and real Belgian chocolate — because shortcuts have no place in our kitchen.

gallery.title: From Our Kitchen to Your Heart
gallery.subtitle: Follow us @sweetdelights

t1.quote: The best cakes in Tashkent, hands down. Their strawberry dream cake was the star of my daughter's birthday party.
t1.name: Dilnoza Karimova

t2.quote: I order from Sweet Delights every week. The macarons are perfectly crafted and the delivery is always on time.
t2.name: Akmal Rakhimov

t3.quote: They made our wedding cake and it was absolutely stunning. Tasted even better than it looked!
t3.name: Sofia & Timur

footer.description: Handcrafted cakes and pastries baked fresh daily with love in Tashkent.

hero.tagline: Build the Future, Ship It Faster

f1.title: AI Workflows
f1.desc: Automate repetitive tasks with intelligent AI that learns how your team works.

f2.title: Real-Time Collaboration
f2.desc: Work together seamlessly with live editing, comments, and instant sync.

f3.title: Advanced Analytics
f3.desc: Track every metric that matters. Beautiful dashboards, actionable insights.
